line.annotation: create_ing(ing38, "1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese spread")
create_ing(ing39, "2 teaspoons ranch salad dressing mix")

line.originaltext: In a bowl, combine cream cheese and dressing mix.
In a bowl, combine cream cheese and dressing mix.
In a bowl, combine cream cheese and dressing mix.
Spread on one side of each slice of bread.
line.annotation: combine({ing40, ing43}, ing44, "bread with spread", "spread on each slice")

line.originaltext: Peel cucumbers if desired thinly slice and place on six slices of bread.
Peel cucumbers if desired thinly slice and place on six slices of bread.
line.annotation: cut(ing41, t11, ing45, "cucumber slices", "peel if desired and thinly slice")

line.originaltext: Peel cucumbers if desired thinly slice and place on six slices of bread.
line.annotation: combine({ing44, ing45}, ing46, "half sandwiches", "place on half the slices of bread")
